(['explosion/wasabi', 'Name already in use', 'wasabi: A lightweight console printing and formatting toolkit'], ['
        ', ' A lightweight console printing and formatting toolkit
      ', '
        Use Git or checkout with SVN using the web URL.
    ', '

  ', 'Your codespace will open once ready.', 'There was a problem preparing your codespace, please try again.', "Over the years, I've written countless implementations of coloring and
formatting utilities to output messages in our libraries like
", ', ', ' and
', ". While there are many other great open-source
options, I've always ended up wanting something slightly different or slightly
custom.", "This package is still a work in progress and aims to bundle those utilities in a
standardised way so they can be shared across our other projects. It's super
lightweight, has zero dependencies and works with Python 3.6+.", '
', '
', '
', '
', "Yes, there's still a few of helpers and features to port over. However, the new
features will be heavily biased by what we (think we) need. I always appreciate
pull requests to improve the existing functionality – but I want to keep this
library as simple, lightweight and specific as possible.", "Sure, if you like it, feel free to adopt it! Just keep in mind that the package
is very specific and not intended to be a full-featured and fully customisable
formatting library. If that's what you're looking for, you might want to try
other packages – for example, ", ',
', ',
', ',
', ',
', ' or
', ', to name a few.', 'I was looking for a short and descriptive name, but everything was already
taken. So I ended up naming this package after one of my rats, Wasabi. ', 'An instance of ', ", initialized with the default config. Useful as a quick
shortcut if you don't need to customize initialization.", 'Print special formatted messages.', 'Print a formatted divider.', 'See ', '.', 'Get the counts of how often the special printers were fired, e.g.
', '. Can be used to print an overview like "X warnings"', 'Lightweight helper to format tabular data.', 'Helper to output custom formatted tracebacks and error messages. Currently used
in ', '.', 'Initialize a traceback printer.', 'Output custom formatted tracebacks and errors.', 'Helper to create Markdown-formatted content. Will store the blocks added to the Markdown document in order.', 'Initialize a Markdown renderer.', 'Add a block to the Markdown document.', 'The rendered Markdown document.', 'Create a Markdown-formatted table.', 'Create a Markdown-formatted heading.', 'Create a Markdown-formatted non-nested list.', 'Create a Markdown-formatted link.', 'Create a Markdown-formatted code block.', 'Create a Markdown-formatted text.', 'Wasabi also respects the following environment variables. The prefix can be
customised on the ', ' via the ', ' argument. For example, setting
', ' will expect the environment variable ', '.', 'Fork or clone the repo, make sure you have ', ' installed and then run it on
the package directory. The tests are located in
', '.', '
